en.title: {{Information Technology}} Attachment
en.text: During my Information Technology attachment, I gained hands-on experience in IT operations, support, and system administration. I worked alongside experienced professionals, contributing to real-world problem-solving, network management, software installation, and user support. This attachment enhanced my technical skills and understanding of IT infrastructure in a professional environment.
list: Provided technical support to end-users by troubleshooting hardware and software issues.
Assisted in the installation and configuration of operating systems, applications, and updates.
Participated in routine maintenance of network equipment and monitored network performance.
Supported user account creation, permission management, and password resets via Active Directory.
Documented incidents, IT procedures, and network diagrams for internal records and audits.
Helped with setting up new workstations, including cabling, imaging, and software configuration.
Worked with the IT team to apply cybersecurity best practices and antivirus protections.
Learned and applied IT service management (ITSM) tools to handle support tickets and issue tracking.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to understand system workflows and technical requirements.
Observed and practiced IT change control procedures and asset management protocols.

en.title: {{Customer Service}} Attachment
en.text: During this industrial attachment, I was primarily engaged in learning and applying customer service principles in a professional setting. The experience focused on building strong communication and interpersonal skills while interacting with clients, understanding their needs, and ensuring a positive service experience. I participated in real-world scenarios that required active listening, problem-solving, and maintaining professionalism in handling inquiries and complaints. This attachment helped me appreciate the importance of customer satisfaction, empathy, and collaboration in delivering quality service and upholding an organization's reputation.
list: Learned the principles of effective customer service in a professional environment.
Interacted with customers to understand their needs and provide appropriate assistance.
Practiced clear and polite communication in both verbal and written interactions.
Observed how to handle customer complaints, inquiries, and feedback professionally.
Assisted in maintaining a positive customer experience across different service channels.
Learned how to manage time effectively while handling multiple customer requests.
Developed active listening skills to ensure accurate understanding of customer issues.
Supported the documentation of customer interactions for future reference and improvement.
Participated in training sessions focused on empathy, patience, and professionalism.
Gained experience in working collaboratively with teams to resolve customer-related issues.

en.title: {{Postman Student}} Leader
en.text: Volunteering as a Postman Student Leader, I promote API literacy and help fellow students learn modern API practices using Postman. I organize workshops, create educational content, and foster community engagement around API development and testing. Through this role, I have strengthened my skills in leadership, communication, and backend development with a focus on real-world applications of APIs.
list: Organized and facilitated workshops and API training sessions for students.
Taught peers how to build, test, and document APIs using Postman tools.
Created API collections and learning resources to support self-paced learning.
Mentored fellow students on RESTful API design and best practices.
Promoted API literacy and awareness through social media and school tech communities.
Collaborated with other Postman Student Leaders and tech clubs for joint events.
Encouraged hands-on learning through challenges, demos, and mini-projects.
Represented the Postman brand and upheld its mission of democratizing APIs.
Gained experience in leadership, event coordination, and public speaking.
Provided feedback to Postman on student experiences and learning improvements.
